title: Super Bowl 54 Preview
itunes:title: Super Bowl 54 Preview
description:
A radio row set filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you their last preview show of the season. The heroes give some final sandwich props and then break down the super bowl with their predictions. Chris "Mad Dog" Russo stops by to talk about the history of sports radio and then the guys make their Super Bowl LIV picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
